summary: This is an email chain between FBI personnel discussing the review of video footage in the DCAP (Digital Collection and Analysis Platform) system. The sender reports reviewing 1,300 out of 3,662 videos, tagging those with individuals as 'file of interest' and others as 'reviewed'. The document is subject to a protective order.

events.title: DCAP Video Review Update
events.description: An FBI employee sends an email update on the review of video footage in the DCAP system, noting they have reviewed 1,300 videos and tagged those with individuals as 'file of interest'.

keyFacts: FBI personnel were reviewing video footage in the DCAP system as part of an investigation.
Out of 3,662 videos, 1,300 had been reviewed at the time of the email.
Videos containing individuals were tagged as 'file of interest' while others were marked 'reviewed'.
The document is subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs.
The email chain references case numbers EFTA_00010224 and EFTA00159872.
